author: rjung
msg: Add the mapping rule extension "stateless" and analogous
They can be used to improve session based load
balancing. We normally count any request without session
id as a new session. Requests known to not create a new
session can be marked using "stateless". They will not
Those requests themselves will be distributed in a
round-robin way (but stickyness would be respected).
